about_the_game:
About This Game

Multiplayer Vehicle Combat game. Set in chaotic 2041, you are one of a few, who can experience “The Program”. All Around Reality Show, which takes place in the Machine Challenger arena.

It will include arena and racing types of gameplay. Multiplayer and single-player modes.

Chose Your Style

The heavier the vehicle, the slower its speed, making it an easier target for others in the arena. However, its robust armor allows it to withstand more hits compared to lighter, faster vehicles with less protection. Choose your combat style wisely: opt for more armor for durability, prioritize speed for agility, or find a balance between the two. The choice is yours!


Vehicle customization

Love customizing your ride? Head to the garage and explore our wide range of cosmetic customization options to give your vehicle a unique and stylish makeover. Whether it's vibrant colors, striking decals, or sleek finishes, the choice is yours. Start with a base model at Tier One and elevate it to Tier 3, creating a standout masterpiece on the track.

Play Different Modes

We don't want you getting bored with just one mode in our car combat game. It can become monotonous quickly, and that's not what we aim for. Our game offers various modes to keep things exciting. Whether you prefer races with or without guns, team battles, Capture the Flag, King of the Hill, or even some hidden modes, we've got you covered. After all, it's all about having fun, right?

About This Game

Multiplayer Vehicle Combat game. Set in chaotic 2041, you are one of a few, who can experience “The Program”. All Around Reality Show, which takes place in the Machine Challenger arena.

It will include arena and racing types of gameplay. Multiplayer and single-player modes.

Chose Your Style

The heavier the vehicle, the slower its speed, making it an easier target for others in the arena. However, its robust armor allows it to withstand more hits compared to lighter, faster vehicles with less protection. Choose your combat style wisely: opt for more armor for durability, prioritize speed for agility, or find a balance between the two. The choice is yours!


Vehicle customization

Love customizing your ride? Head to the garage and explore our wide range of cosmetic customization options to give your vehicle a unique and stylish makeover. Whether it's vibrant colors, striking decals, or sleek finishes, the choice is yours. Start with a base model at Tier One and elevate it to Tier 3, creating a standout masterpiece on the track.

Play Different Modes

We don't want you getting bored with just one mode in our car combat game. It can become monotonous quickly, and that's not what we aim for. Our game offers various modes to keep things exciting. Whether you prefer races with or without guns, team battles, Capture the Flag, King of the Hill, or even some hidden modes, we've got you covered. After all, it's all about having fun, right?
name: Machine Challenger

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 version 15063.0 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i3-4170 @ 3.7Ghz OR Intel i5 750 @ 2.67Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia 650TI OR AMD R7 250x
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 version 15063.0 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i7-3820 @ 3.6Ghz
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 970 OR NVidia GTX 1060 3GB OR AMD R9 290x OR AMD RX 470
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
